title: Resilient Drylands: Innovating for Sustainable Agricultural Landscapes and Livelihoods

tasks.task: Attend a webinar on Resilient Drylands Innovating for Sustainable Agricultural Landscape and Livelihoods.
subtasks: Introduce yourself in the chat with your name and country.
Recognize the importance of drylands and their contribution to agriculture and landscapes.
Listen to various speakers and their contributions to drylands sustainability.
Learn about the innovative approaches, challenges, and technologies related to dryland agriculture.
Understand the role of traditional knowledge and community-based initiatives in enhancing sustainability.
Explore digital agricultural innovations and their potential in climate resilience.
Discuss the importance of empowering smallholder farmers and promoting agri-food entrepreneurship.
Consider policy and institutional frameworks to support dryland agriculture and ecosystem restoration.
Share knowledge and best practices through digital platforms and collaborative networks.
Reflect on the need for integrated and holistic approaches to address dryland challenges.
